position: bottom-0 md:right-0 md:mr-2 ml-2 mb-4 xs:mx-auto xs:inset-x-0
border: rounded-lg shadow-lg border dark:border-gray-300 border-gray-400 border-solid
title: pb-2 roboto-condensed dark:text-gray-200 font-semibold text-lg flex flex-row items-center text-gray-700
accept: cursor-pointer text-white bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 via-green-500 to-green-600 hover:bg-gradient-to-br focus:ring-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-green-300 dark:focus:ring-green-800 shadow-lg shadow-green-500/50 dark:shadow-lg dark:shadow-green-800/80 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-4 py-2 text-center
